name: Hotdogs Hunger and Hand Pain
description:
Here's a game I made for Ludum Dare 40!

Background:

You're a very enthusiastic hot dog cook. And you're a pretty hungry guy. You've gotta make some food!

But there's one problem... Your arthritis has been acting up lately. Don't let it bring you down!

Instructions:

Cook some hotdogs! Throw 'em on the grill and eat them when they're ready. But don't let your Arthro-Meter(TM) fill up or it's game over!

Controls:

J -- throw a hotdog on the grill

K -- eat a hotdog from the grill (you'll always take the most cooked ones first!)

L -- Beat your arthritis into submission

OR you can use the mouse and click on the buttons and hotdogs

Tip: Uncooked hotdogs will bring down your score! And overcooked hotdogs don't change your score at all! Try to find the sweet spot!
